1.name: Turtle
1.text: hey there bunny, how are you?

2.name: Turtle
2.text: i hate to be down but i'm not doing so well..

4.name: Turtle
4.text: i just want to cook for others

5.name: Turtle
5.text: i want to make others happy

7.name: Turtle
7.text: maybe you could go see frog?

8.name: Turtle
8.text: i hope he can come in, at least..

1.name: Turtle
1.text: i'll just be here waiting for customers..
